\csdef{def_toc}{%
    \DeclareTOCStyleEntry[beforeskip=-7bp plus -1bp minus -1bp]{tocline}{section}%
    \DeclareTOCStyleEntries[beforeskip=-14bp plus -1bp minus -1bp, linefill=\hfill]{tocline}{subsection, subsubsection}%
    \renewcommand\tableofcontents{%
        \subsection*{\contentsname}%
        \@mkboth{\MakeUppercase\contentsname}%
        {\MakeUppercase\contentsname}%
        \@starttoc{toc}}%
}

\csdef{def_lists}{%
    \providecolor{zhorange}{rgb}{1,0,0}%
    \setlist{nolistsep}%
    \setlist{\labelindent=\parindent, labelwidth=1em} % horizontale Abst√§nde
    \setlist{itemsep=0ex, parsep=0ex} % vertikaler Abstand zwischen Items
    %
    \setlist[itemize]{noitemsep,topsep=0ex,partopsep=0ex}%
    \setlist[itemize,1]{font=\usekomafont{labelinglabel}, label=\raisebox{0.4ex}{$\centerdot$}}%
    %
    \setlist[enumerate]{font=\usekomafont{labelinglabel}, label=\arabic*.}%
    \newlist{inumerate}{enumerate*}{1}%
    \setlist[inumerate]{font=\usekomafont{labelinglabel}, label=(\arabic*)}%
    %
    \newlist{taskitemize}{itemize}{1}%
    \setlist[taskitemize]{font=\usekomafont{zhbold}\color{zhorange}}%
    %
    \newenvironment{inumeratepar}%
        {\begin{minipage}{\textwidth}}%
        {\end{minipage}}%
}

% boxes
\providecolor{zhblue}{rgb}{0,0,1}%

\setlength\fboxsep{1em}
\DeclareTColorBox{zhbox}{ o O{zhblue} }{%
    enhanced,%
    colframe=#2,colback=white,colbacktitle=#2!5!white,%
    fonttitle=\usekomafont{small_col},%
    IfValueTF={#1}{title = #1}{notitle},%
    sharp corners,%
    width=\textwidth,%
    boxsep=\fboxsep, oversize,%
    attach boxed title to top left={xshift=\fboxsep*2, yshift =-\tcboxedtitleheight/2},
    boxed title style={sharp corners}}
